results.title: Serum ubiquinone concentrations after short- and long-term treatment with HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors.
results.text_hl: Serum @CHEMICAL_Ubiquinone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014451 @@@ubiquinone@@@ levels were studied during long- and short-term treatment with 3-hydroxy-3-methyl-glutaryl-coenzyme A reductase inhibitors in 17 @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with primary @<m>DISEASE_Epilepsy_Benign_Neonatal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020936 @@@non-familial hypercholesterolaemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Laaksonen R, Ojala JP, Tikkanen MJ, Himberg JJ. Serum ubiquinone concentrations after short- and long-term treatment with HMG-CoA reductase inhibitors. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 1994;46(4):313-7. PMID: 7957515
